creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: purple-red and blue stripes on center panel; open sides; red velvet trim at top of shoulders; purple velvet trim and ties on square neckline; woven with multicolored geometric dot designs at top of front and back; crocheted flower-like roundels on shoulders and center front and back below neckline; embroidered lace medallions at corners of collar embellishment; radiating rows of rickrack around neckline; four vertical zippers-two on each side of upper body at panel seams
title: Huipil
